pages.text: Trim the bottoms and stand the spears up in a glass or jar with about an inch of water.
The level of ripeness also plays a role in chili shelf life. Green, unripe chili peppers generally have a longer shelf life than fully ripe or overripe ones.
You do not need to wash the peppers before storing. It is best for them to be dry, as water can speed up the rotting process.
Not all sweet potato tubers are suitable for storage. Tubers that are mechanically damaged, infested with pests, infected by pathogens, rotten, or sprouting should not be stored.
